mapper.select: select m.guid_of_whats as guidOfWhats, n.guid as guidBranch, m.for_what as forWhat, m.status as status, n.full_path as fullPath, n.branch_type as branchType, n.branch_for as branchFor, n.curr_version as currVersion, n.last_version as lastVersion from s_branch n, s_branch_mapping m where m.for_what = #{forWhat} AND m.guid_of_whats in ${ids} AND n.guid = m.guid_branch
